title: SK 45183 Flex Head Ratchet– 3/8-Inch Drive 11-Inch Fractional Gear, SuperKrome Finish Metric Hand Tool. Professional Series Metal Enclosure
features: Knurled Grip Extensions: diamond knurled grip ratchet provides sure handling, even when oily. High strength gear. Chamfered ends help lead the socket over fastener heads. Completely enclosed ratcheting mechanism. Easy to remove and replace for cleaning or rebuilding
High End Design: ratchet gear has 11 inch flex head. Comes with hardened pawl and teeth. Triple tooth contact metric hand tools provide smooth ratcheting action with little back movement

SuperKrome plating Ratchet: flex head ratchet carries jewelry-like finish, Carries maximum corrosion resistance. Triple tooth contact fractional gear ensures smooth ratcheting action. Hardened pawl and teeth are for high durability and long life. Metric utilities can work in harsh working environments

Hugh Quality Workmanship Enclosure: strong and reliable hand tool. 3/8-Inch Drive 10.9-Inch Professional Flex Head Ratchet features quality workmanship and value. Performs well in high torque applications
Portable Metric Unit: metric ratchet measures 10.9 x 1.4 x 0.6 inches and weighs 14.6 ounces. Lightweight mechanical gear is easy to carry and is flexible to fit in appliances
description: The SK Hand Tools 3/8-Inch Drive 10.9-Inch Professional Flex Head Ratchet features quality workmanship and value, while providing a strong and reliable tool. The ratchet delivers a completely enclosed ratcheting mechanism which is easy to remove and replace for cleaning or rebuilding. The included triple tooth contact provides smooth ratcheting action with little back movement, while the diamond knurled grip provides sure handling, even when oily. Chamfered ends help lead the socket over fastener heads, while the diamond knurled grip provides sure handling, even when oily. This professional series ratchet also features a hardened pawl and teeth for durability and long life. Additionally, the SuperKrome plating results in a jewelry-like finish that allows for easy clean-up as well as maximum corrosion resistance.

SK Professional series ratchets feature a completely enclosed ratcheting mechanism which is easy to remove and replace for cleaning or rebuilding. Triple tooth contact provides smooth ratcheting action with little back movement. Professional series ratchets also feature hardened pawl and teeth for durability and long life. Diamond knurled grip provides sure handling, even when oily. Chamfered ends help lead the socket over fastener heads. SuperKrome® plating results in a jewelry-like finish, providing ease of clean-up and maximum corrosion resistance.
